info.author: Dinu C. Gherman
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
This module/tool is a first attempt at converting TIFF files created
on Mac OS X using the Cocoa classes NSImage and NSBitmapRep to other
bitmap formats, like JPEG, GIF, PNG, etc. The conversion is delegated
to PIL, the Python Imaging Library, which itself cannot read TIFF
files created from the Cocoa AppKit.
info.name: tiff2sth
info.summary: A converter for Cocoa TIFFs to other bitmap formats.
info.html_description: This module/tool is a first attempt at converting TIFF files created on Mac OS X using the Cocoa classes NSImage and NSBitmapRep to other bitmap formats, like JPEG, GIF, PNG, etc. The conversion is delegated to PIL, the Python Imaging Library, which itself cannot read TIFF files created from the Cocoa AppKit.
